trans-unit.source: Binds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (or another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> implementation).
trans-unit.target: Associa un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (o a un'altra implementazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" />).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> associa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> è l'implementazione di primaria il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interfaccia per il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] sistema dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: In generale, quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> viene eseguita, viene richiamato il comando, anche se il comportamento del comando è influenzato ulteriormente da fattori specifici di comando, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui comandi, vedere il [panoramica dei comandi](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si definisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], esistono due modi per specificare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: Il primo modo per stabilire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento, che consente una sintassi per specificare le azioni del mouse e i modificatori come un'unica stringa, ad esempio, "CTRL + LeftClick".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo modo consiste nel definire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attributo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> sono equivalenti e modificare lo stesso oggetto sottostante, ma ci sarà un conflitto se entrambi vengono utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Nel caso quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> gli attributi sono impostati entrambi, il movimento non è valido.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], anche se non si specificano modificatori; ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione più semplice per serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> possono essere definite in un oggetto specifico o a livello di classe registrando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> sulla <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> classe.

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: Il modo più comune per definire un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> si trova all'interno del modello di controllo, impostando il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> proprietà [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] dichiarando uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elementi.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> per associare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the gesture.
trans-unit.target: Comando associato al movimento.

trans-unit.source: The gesture associated with the command.
trans-unit.target: Movimento associato al comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> con il comando specifico e il movimento del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> using a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come associare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia i valori di base (non animati) delle proprietà dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Copia i valori correnti delle proprietà dell'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il movimento associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The gesture.
trans-unit.target: Movimento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> con o senza un set di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> non è necessario disporre di un tasto di modifica associato.

trans-unit.source: The following example show how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'associazione tra un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture" /> is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture" /> è impostato su <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: Rende l'istanza un clone bloccato dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> specificato usando i valori di proprietà di base (non animati).

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da clonare.

trans-unit.source: Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea dall'istanza corrente un duplicato bloccato dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto ha proprietà di dipendenza animate, i valori animati correnti vengono copiati.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: The mouse action.
trans-unit.target: Azione del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> non deve essere associato a un tasto di modifica.

trans-unit.source: So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> da solo, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, può essere un valore valido <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un'associazione tra un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction" />.
